list.name: Changes
list.comment: Traceback (most recent call last): File "/mount/src/yahoo_oauth/main.py", line 1594, in perform_import_flow if "year" in row and row["year"]: ~~~^^^^^^^^ TypeError: string indices must be integers, not 'str'

task.summary: Default task

Fix manager_week/manager_year_week column mismatch causing transformation failures
- Add bidirectional alias in add_composite_keys(): if either column exists, create the other to ensure consistency between matchup and player data - Update player_to_matchup_v2.py to handle either column name when validating - Stop dropping manager_week after processing to preserve it for downstream scripts - This fixes the root cause of 16/18 transformation failures in cloud imports
Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)
Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>

MESSAGE.value:
Fix main.py to create LeagueContext for initial import
- Import LeagueContext and create context file before running initial_import_v2.py - Discover all seasons for a league to import full history - Use league-specific data directories for isolation between leagues - Update collect_parquet_files to use league-specific directory - Read GITHUB_TOKEN from st.secrets - Remove secrets.toml from repo (keep in .gitignore)
Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)
Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>

Add debug logging to troubleshoot data truncation
- Log what trigger sends (league_id, name, season, start_year) - Log what workflow receives and decodes - Will help identify where truncation occurs
Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)
Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>

Add separate playoff odds workflow with generic league settings support
- Create playoff_odds_worker.yml for dedicated Monte Carlo simulations (10,000 default) - Add league_settings.parquet consolidation step to main import workflow - Download and extract league settings in playoff workflow for per-year config - Build league_ids mapping in context for proper year isolation - 3-hour timeout for full simulations
This makes playoff odds calculation generic for any league configuration (playoff teams, bye slots, reseeding rules) instead of hardcoded defaults.
Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)
Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
